CustomField.description: Compliance has requested that the FinCEN mandated information identifying Beneficial Owner(s) and Control Person(s) form to be submitted when the Opportunity is converting to an Engagement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Engagements done through 'Cap, Inc.' as the HL Entity, and the HL Client's ownership is not excluded from the CDD requirements (please see the Beneficial Owner & Control Person form on the intranet), REQUIRE the completion of a form.
CustomField.label: Beneficial Owner & Control Person form?
